[2018-11-29 07:00:45]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 07:00:45]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 07:01:39]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 07:01:39]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-29 07:01:41]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 07:01:41]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 07:04:22]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 07:04:22]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-29 07:04:24]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 07:04:24]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 07:09:38]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 07:09:38]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-29 07:09:40]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 07:09:40]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 07:12:06]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 07:12:06]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-29 07:12:08]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 07:12:08]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 07:29:19]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 07:29:19]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-11-29 07:29:21]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name,office_email FROM cms_employees WHERE id =15 AND is_active = 1


[2018-11-29 07:29:21]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name FROM cms_clients WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-11-29 07:29:21]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-11-29 07:29:22]

 Param Details:

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

 Param Details :

[2018-11-29 07:29:38]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 07:30:45]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name FROM cms_clients WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-11-29 07:30:45]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-11-29 07:33:15]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 07:33:15]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10


[2018-11-29 07:33:16]

[2018-11-29 07:33:16]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008


[2018-11-29 07:35:57]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name,office_email FROM cms_employees WHERE id =15 AND is_active = 1


[2018-11-29 07:35:57]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name FROM cms_clients WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-11-29 07:35:57]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-11-29 07:35:58]

 Param Details:

 Param Details:

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

						, notes

						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

 Param Details:

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 07:41:34]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-29 07:41:36]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 07:41:36]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 07:42:01]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-11-29 07:42:02]

[2018-11-29 07:42:03]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 07:42:03]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

Function Details: db_query

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 07:44:56]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-29 07:44:58]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 07:44:58]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 07:50:58]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 07:50:58]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id as emp_id, name, email,office_email, username
						, is_admin, initial_pswd
						, (select id from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level
						
						, cms_emp_login_sessions.token
		                , accessible_ctg
						, malaysia_phone
						, concat('http://127.0.0.1/mspdoc_bare/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		                , super_admin  FROM cms_employees
						LEFT join cms_emp_login_sessions ON
						 	cms_employees.id = cms_emp_login_sessions.emp_id WHERE cms_employees.username	= 'jamal' AND cms_employees.pswd = '74f56399c89f4bd03ff5e85b6bf4e85f' AND cms_employees.is_active = 1

SELECT 
        id
        , employee_no
        , name
        , photoname
		, ic_passport
		, sex_id
		, age
		, date_format(dob,'%d-%m-%Y') as dob
		, nationality
		, birth_place
		, religion
		, race
		, designation
        , employer_id
		, home_phone
		, malaysia_phone
		, office_phone
		, local_address
        , home_address
        , home_country
		, email
		, office_email
		, username
        , pswd
		, is_admin
        , access_level
		, chat_id
		, dept_id
		, reporting_to_id
		, allow_add
        , allow_approve
        , allow_verify
        , allow_contract_approve
		, allow_contract_create
		, allow_contract_view_all
		, allow_contract_access
		, general_skills
        , specific_skills
        , date_format(work_start_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_start_date
        , date_format(work_end_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as work_end_date
        , salary
        , date_format(ep_valid_till,'%d-%m-%Y') as ep_valid_till
        , notice_period_id
		, spouse_name
		, spouse_occupation
		, date_format(marriage_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as marriage_date
		, spouse_ic
		, spouse_company
		, spouse_company_address
		, no_of_children
		, emergency_person
		, emergency_relation
		, emergency_address
		, emergency_phone
		, bank_acc_name
		, bank_acc_ic
		, bank_name
		, bank_account_no
		, accessible_ctg
		, super_admin
		, is_active
		, concat('http://127.0.0.1/mspdoc_bare/services/files/', 'photos/',id,'.jpeg') as profile_pic
		, date_format(leaving_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as leaving_date
		, leaving_reason
		, created_by
        , (select employer_name from cms_master_employer where cms_master_employer.id = cms_employees.employer_id) as employer_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.dept_id) as dept_name
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.notice_period_id) as notice_period
        , (select descr from cms_master_list where cms_master_list.id = cms_employees.access_level) as access_level_name
         FROM cms_employees WHERE id = 15

[2018-11-29 20:31:31]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-29 20:31:33]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 20:31:33]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

                        FROM

Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: get_document_archiving_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","type_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 20:33:08]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_document_archiving.doc_no
				, cms_document_archiving.doc_date
				, cms_document_archiving.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_document_archiving.from_date
				, cms_document_archiving.to_date
				, IF(cms_document_archiving.notify = 1, 'Yes','No') as notify
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_by
				, cms_document_archiving.notify_email
				, cms_document_archiving.attachment
				, cms_document_archiving.remarks
				, cms_document_archiving.notes
				, cms_document_archiving.approvals
				, cms_document_archiving.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.doc_type) as doc_type
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_document_archiving.status_id) as status_name		
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_document_archiving.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_document_archiving
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_document_archiving.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_document_archiving.created_by) AND cms_document_archiving.is_active in(1) ORDER BY doc_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT 
						  doc_no		
						, date_format(doc_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as doc_date	
						, client_id
						, doc_type
						, date_format(from_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as from_date	
						, date_format(to_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as to_date	
						, notify
						, date_format(notify_by,'%d-%m-%Y') as notify_by	
						, notify_email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, notes
						, approvals
						, status_id						
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_document_archiving WHERE doc_no = 1002


[2018-11-29 20:34:37]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name,office_email FROM cms_employees WHERE id =15 AND is_active = 1


[2018-11-29 20:34:37]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name FROM cms_clients WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-11-29 20:34:37]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-29 20:34:39]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 20:34:39]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-11-29 20:43:02]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 20:43:02]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1


[2018-11-29 20:43:03]

[2018-11-29 20:43:04]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 20:43:04]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

[2018-11-29 20:44:55]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 20:44:55]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-29 20:44:57]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 20:44:57]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 20:47:24]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-29 20:47:26]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 20:47:26]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

[2018-11-29 20:47:57]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date

[2018-11-29 20:52:19]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 20:52:19]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-29 20:52:31]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 20:52:31]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 20:53:43]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 20:53:43]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 20:56:53]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-29 20:56:55]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 20:56:55]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

[2018-11-29 21:00:11]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 21:00:11]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-29 21:00:13]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 21:00:13]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

 Param Details:

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 21:02:32]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-29 21:02:34]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 21:02:34]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

[2018-11-29 21:03:00]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 21:04:23]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT id,name FROM cms_clients WHERE is_active = 1


[2018-11-29 21:04:23]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-29 21:04:25]
Function Details: get_outbound_list 
 Param Details : 
{"client_id":"","created_by":"","category_id":"","status_id":"","view_all":"0","start_index":0,"limit":10,"is_admin":"0","emp_id":"15"}


[2018-11-29 21:04:25]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

[2018-11-29 21:04:40]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details: 
SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1

[2018-11-29 21:04:45]
Function Details: db_query_list
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_outbound_document.outbound_no
				, cms_outbound_document.outbound_date
				, cms_outbound_document.client_id
				, IFNULL(cms_clients.name,'') as client_name
				, cms_outbound_document.attention_to
				, cms_outbound_document.email_content
				, cms_outbound_document.email
				, cms_outbound_document.attachment
				, cms_outbound_document.remarks
				, cms_outbound_document.notes
				, cms_outbound_document.approvals
				, cms_outbound_document.created_date
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.ctg_id) as category_name
				, (select descr from cms_master_list list where list.id = cms_outbound_document.status_id) as status_name
				, (select name from cms_employees emp where emp.id = cms_outbound_document.created_by) as created_by		
                 FROM 
                cms_outbound_document
				LEFT JOIN cms_clients
                    ON (cms_outbound_document.client_id = cms_clients.id)
                 WHERE 15 IN (cms_outbound_document.created_by) AND cms_outbound_document.is_active in(1) ORDER BY outbound_no DESC limit 0,10

SELECT 
						  outbound_no		
						, date_format(outbound_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as outbound_date	
						, client_id
						, attention_to
						, email_content
						, email
						, attachment
						, remarks
						, approvals
						, status_id
						, ctg_id
						, notes
						, is_active
						, date_format(created_date,'%d-%m-%Y') as created_date
						, created_by			
					 FROM cms_outbound_document WHERE outbound_no = 1008

[2018-11-29 21:05:20]
Function Details: db_query
 Param Details:

[2018-11-29 21:05:20]
Function Details: db_execute_custom_sql
 Param Details: 
SELECT cms_appt_pic.id,cms_appt_pic.name,cms_appt_pic.email, cms_clients.name as company_name
                        FROM cms_appt_pic INNER JOIN cms_clients ON cms_appt_pic.client = cms_clients.id
                        WHERE cms_appt_pic.created_by = 15 
                         UNION ALL
                        SELECT cms_employees.id, cms_employees.name, cms_employees.office_email as email,
                        cms_master_employer.employer_name  as company_name
                        FROM
                        cms_employees INNER JOIN cms_master_employer ON cms_employees.employer_id = cms_master_employer.id
                        WHERE cms_employees.is_active = 1
